participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

BIKE_05a.LongName: Initial heart rate at idle-PULSE OX

BIKE_08.Description: Heart rate is collected at rest and after 6 minutes of pedaling at 70rpm at age-determined resistance level. | Calculation = [BIKE_06]-[BIKE_05]

BIKE_10.Description:
Predicted VO2max is in L/min, HRss is the steady heart rate after 6 min of exercise,  and the workload in kg.m/min. To convert a load in watts to kg.m/min, multiply the watts by 6.12.   Females: VO2max = (0.00193 x workload + 0.326) / (0.769 x HRss - 56.1) x 100 ; Males: VO2max = (0.00212 x workload + 0.299) / (0.769 x HRss - 48.5) x 100

Range should be between 12-90 | Calculation = iif([BIKE_02]==1,((0.00212*([BIKE_09]*6.12)+0.299)/((0.769*([BIKE_06])-48.5))*100), 
        iif([BIKE_02]==2,((0.00193*([BIKE_09]*6.12)+0.326)/((0.769*([BIKE_06])-56.1))*100), 'Gender not entered'))
